title: Receive email with Amazon SES and process using an AWS Lambda function
description: This shows how to receive email with Amazon SES and process them using AWS Lambda.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: User sends email to the configured domain in Amazon SES.
Amazon SES receives the email and then applies the rule set to trigger an AWS Lambda function.
The AWS Lambda function processes the information from the SES event.
